predicate.note: Frames file for 'underpin' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'support'.

example.name: active
example.text: The share buy-back plan is likely *trace* to underpin B.A.T's share price.

example.name: passive
example.text: London share prices closed modestly higher largely on technical factors, although the market was underpinned *trace* near the end of the session by Wall Street's firmer trend.
example.arg: near the end of the session
